statements: SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM successful_phishing_attacks;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE id > 100 AND id < 200 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, COUNT(id) AS total_attacks FROM successful_phishing_attacks GROUP BY id HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT MONTH(timestamp) AS month, COUNT(id) AS total_attacks FROM successful_phishing_attacks GROUP BY month ORDER BY total_attacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM phishing_attacks;
SELECT attack_id, timestamp FROM phishing_attacks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT attack_id, timestamp FROM phishing_attacks WHERE attack_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM peak_engagement_times WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT engagement_id, attack_id, engagement_level FROM peak_engagement_times;
SELECT * FROM phishing_attacks;
SELECT attack_id, timestamp FROM peak_engagement_times ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT attack_id, engagement_level FROM peak_engagement_times WHERE engagement_level > 5;
SELECT AVG(engagement_level) AS avg_engagement_level FROM peak_engagement_times GROUP BY attack_id HAVING COUNT(engagement_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM phishing_attacks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM phishing_attacks WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM phishing_attacks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM peak_engagement_times WHERE attack_id = 1;
SELECT attacker_name, location FROM attacker_details WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM phishing_attacks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, success FROM phishing_attacks WHERE success = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, attacker_name, location FROM attacker_details WHERE location LIKE 'US%' ORDER BY attacker_name;
SELECT id, engagement_time, attack_id FROM peak_engagement_times WHERE engagement_time BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY engagement_time;
SELECT * FROM phishing_attacks JOIN peak_engagement_times ON phishing_attacks.id = peak_engagement_times.attack_id WHERE success = true AND engagement_time > '2022-06-15';
SELECT attacker_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attacks FROM attacker_details JOIN phishing_attacks ON attacker_details.id = phishing_attacks.id GROUP BY attacker_name ORDER BY total_attacks DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks;
SELECT attacker_ip, victim_email FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE attacker_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT timestamp, attacker_ip, victim_email FROM successful_phishing_attacks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM phishing_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%malicious%';
SELECT location_id, location_name, geo_location FROM phishing_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks ORDER BY timestamp DESC, attacker_ip ASC;
SELECT victim_email, timestamp FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE attacker_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT location_name, geo_location FROM phishing_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%office%' AND geo_location ILIKE 'us%';
SELECT pa.analysis_id, pa.analysis_result, pea.engagement_duration FROM phishing_analysis pa INNER JOIN peak_engagement_times pea ON pa.engagement_id = pea.engagement_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attacks, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) AS month FROM successful_phishing_attacks GROUP BY month ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks;
SELECT attack_id, attacker_ip, victim_email FROM successful_phishing_attacks ORDER BY attack_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM peak_engagement_times WHERE engagement_duration > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT victim_email FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE attacker_ip = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT email_address, engagement_count FROM victim_emails WHERE engagement_count > 5 ORDER BY last_engagement_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM successful_phishing_attacks ORDER BY attack_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT victim_email, engagement_duration FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE attacker_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT engagement_timestamp, engagement_duration FROM peak_engagement_times WHERE engagement_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT victim_email, engagement_duration FROM successful_phishing_attacks WHERE engagement_duration BETWEEN INTERVAL '1 hour' AND INTERVAL '2 hours';
SELECT analysis_id, peak_engagement_time FROM attack_analysis ORDER BY peak_engagement_time ASC LIMIT 5;
